Package net.croz.nrich.validation.constraint.support.disableconstraints

Class ValidatorAdapter

java.lang.Object
net.croz.nrich.validation.constraint.support.disableconstraints.ValidatorAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.validation.Validator
public class ValidatorAdapter extends Object implements jakarta.validation.Validator
Enables usage of DisableConstraints annotation for disabling validation constraints.
